constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Tolworth Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Demolition of existing bungalow and erection of 2 x three-bedroom dwelling houses, with associated refuse storage, amenity space and cycle stand
decision_conditions: By reason of siting on the shared boundaries, the proposal would appear incongruous and out of keeping with the prevailing character and pattern of development within the surrounding area, as such the proposal is contrary to policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and policy CS8 and DM10 of the Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames Local Development Framework Core Strategy (2012).

The proposed development, due to its siting on the side boundaries of the site, would result in an unreasonable loss of light and outlook to habitable windows in the flank wall of both neighbouring properties at 41 and 47 Tankerton Road. The proposal would therefore be contrary to policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and policy DM10 of the Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames Local Development Framework Core Strategy (2012).
